BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE ROANOKE VALLEY SOCIETY FOR THE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: The Roanoke Valley SPCA is a community resource that rpovides pet adoption, retention, and education services in Virginia's Blue Ridge.
IRS990.MissionDesc: The Roanoke Valley SPCA is a community resource that rpovides pet adoption, retention, and education services in Virginia's Blue Ridge.
IRS990.Desc: THE RVSPCA PROMOTES THE HUMANE TREATMENT OF ANIMALS AND ENCOURAGES INTEREST IN THE WELFARE, HEALTH AND LIFE OF ALL ANIMALS. IT ALSO INCLUDES THE PLACEMENT OF ANIMALS IN ADOPTIVE HOMES AND TRAINING AND EDUCATION OF PET OWNERS AND PETS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO PROVIDE ANNUAL INCOME TO SUPPORT THE ORGANIZATION'S OPERATIONS.
